name: llama-gpu
description: Node.js tooling, scripts, pre-commit hooks, and future frontend/server support for LLaMA-GPU project. Current phase: advanced features scaffolded (fine-tuning, distributed inference, security, caching, monitoring, edge optimization). All changes and test outputs are logged in logs/. Code is modular, maintainable, and well-documented. Next: implement advanced features, expand docs, and add frontend/server integration.

scripts.test: echo 'No JS tests yet' > logs/test_output.log && echo 'Test output logged.'
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run format
